channel.title: More help with talking npcs!
channel.description:
i got the code but where can i get cordinates for varrock fountain???
[glow=red,2,300]every1 says next to run but i cant find -.- and if possible how to make ur signature glow??[/glow]

item.title: More help with talking npcs!
item.dc:creator: @skater_chick skater chick
item.description:
@skater_chick wrote:

  1. the coordinates are next to your run. its right below it. it will say " X-bla bla bla, Y-bla bla bla.
  2. the way i make my sig glow i go to any topic and hit reply and type in wat i want my sig to be and make it glow from there then copy and past to you sig.

~Skater Chick~

Read full topic
